subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are planning a spring training competition for the starting center field job, with Melky Cabrera and Brett Gardner the candidates. They wanted to add a more experienced name to the mix, but Andruw Jones turned them down.
snippet: The Yankees are planning a spring training competition for the starting center field job, with Melky Cabrera and Brett Gardner the candidates. They wanted to add a more experienced name to the mix, but Andruw Jones turned them down.
